results.title: Healthcare Data Solutions - Insight
results.description: Insight’s healthcare IT solutions and services include point-of-care technology, healthcare IT infrastructure and HIPPA-compliant mobility and security.
extra_snippets: Healthcare data is a valuable target for cybercriminals. We’ll help you safeguard sensitive patient information. Our solutions are fundamentally secure and HIPAA-compliant, designed to keep hackers out, protect patient records and ensure uptime.
Get healthcare IT solutions and services that are HIPPA and FIPPs compliant and secure. We’ll modernize your healthcare IT infrastructure, upgrade point-of-care technology and more.

Automation is a game changer for healthcare organizations — helping reduce costs, streamline processes and improve patient outcomes. Learn how this major health system prioritized data center modernization to reduce the number of manual steps to manage platforms from nearly 40 to zero.

Healthcare is undergoing a monumental shift. The surge in telehealth coupled with overburdened staff and longer patient stays has drastically changed how organizations provide care. Ignoring challenges isn’t an option when lives are on the line — and you need a trusted technology partner to guide your transformation journey. Build an IT ecosystem that meets data, performance, compliance and security needs.

results.title: Healthcare Data Solutions announces acquisition of StratCenter ...
results.description: Healthcare Data Solutions announced the acquisition of StratCenter®, a leading provider of HCO (Healthcare Organizational) data on Hospitals, IDNs (Integrated Delivery Networks), GPOs (Group Purchasing Organizations), and Non-Acute Care provider entities, as well as the latest industry news.
extra_snippets: Healthcare Data Solutions announced the acquisition of StratCenter®, a leading provider of HCO (Healthcare Organizational) data on Hospitals, IDNs (Integrated Delivery Networks), GPOs (Group Purchasing Organizations), and Non-Acute Care provider entities, as well as the latest industry news.

StratCenter® provides best-in-class HCO (Healthcare Organizational) data on Hospitals, IDNs (Integrated Delivery Networks), GPOs (Group Purchasing Organizations), and Non-Acute Care provider entities, as well as the latest industry news. Suppliers and providers rely on StratCenter® Intel and integrated solutions to make better decisions, implement go-to-market strategies, and drive sales. “Healthcare is evolving quickly, and companies need access to IDN, GPO and hospital information to keep up and be successful,” says Tim Slevin, CEO of Healthcare Data Solutions.

Healthcare Data Solutions is a leading healthcare information services company focused on building and maintaining the most accurate, compliance-grade data on Physicians, Dentists, Nurse Practitioners and other Healthcare Providers, as well as Pharmacies and Hospitals.

“Healthcare is evolving quickly, and companies need access to IDN, GPO and hospital information to keep up and be successful,” says Tim Slevin, CEO of Healthcare Data Solutions. “Our initial mission was to build a deep and detailed Healthcare Provider database, as well as all critical provider relationships in their networks and affiliations.
